creator: Arlamowski Investment
descriptionHtml:
Control your home automation system using the wBox app and µPortal.

Using wBox devices you can control appliances in your home, garden, office or even a car with smartphone or tablet from anywhere in the World.

Visit www.blebox.eu for more details.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- redesigned view of action editor in switchBox, switchBoxD and tempSensor
- inter devices actions with automatic IP address discovery - Multicast DNS based
(no static addresses are required in your network to run actions between devices,
e.g. close the window when the room temperature drops below the set value)
- new device type support: tvLift
- new view options for airSensor

title: wBox by blebox.eu

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- notification and event log for portal activities (e.g. device sharing information)
- notification and event log for tempSensor based on user-defined temperature thresholds
(notifications are available for enabling for each logged in user in the notification settings)
- proxiBox support - touch button with WiFi wireless actions
- new option is app settings: font size selection
